mods.abstract: The Blaze was the student newspaper for Siena College, institution of higher education for Catholic women in Memphis and sister school to Christian Brothers' men's school. The playlist for WCBC radio station can be seen on the last page of this issue.

name.namePart: Staff: Cathy McGehee (editor), Ursula Sherrill (Associate Editor), Bertha Puryear (Business Manager), Judy McWillie (Cartoonist); Virginia Brown (Columnist)

mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
